metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000229 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow bug in function minitiff_read_info() of optipng 0.7.6allows an attacker to remotely execute code or cause denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000229` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

optipng - 0.7.6-1ubuntu0.16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: optipng package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.7.6-1ubuntu0.16.04.1').
